title: i cant play cause of 5 min afk ban but it keeps restarting

replies.body: The lower priority queue is a good way to catch continued connection problems that might have otherwise occurred in-game.  Your network might be having hiccups and kicking you off the matchmaking queue, which would reset your timer.  Try out the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection to our services are stable!
